entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
